home.welcomeText: Welcome to Skyntr, the cutting-edge frontend platform that fuses modern web technologies with the timeless power of ancient runes.
home.watchwordDesc: Code like a viking. Ship like a god.

fehu.description: Fehu embodies beginnings, material well-being, and new opportunities. It symbolizes gain, the energy of accumulation, and achievement.

uruz.description: Uruz speaks of inner strength, endurance, and potential. It is a rune of action and transformation through challenges.

thurisaz.description: Thurisaz is the energy of force and protection. It urges caution but also decisive action in difficult situations.

ansuz.description: Ansuz is connected with the wisdom of the gods, inspiration, and clear thinking. It is a rune of language, knowledge, and intellect.

raidho.description: Raidho indicates a journey – both physical and spiritual. It symbolizes the path, the rhythm of life, and the right direction.

kenaz.description: Kenaz is a torch that gives light. It embodies creativity, the unfolding of potential, and inspiration.

gebo.description: Gebo symbolizes a gift, the exchange of energy, and partnership. It teaches balancing what you give and receive.

wunjo.description: Wunjo brings joy, harmony, and emotional balance. It is a rune of well-being and contentment.

hagalaz.description: Hagalaz is a rune of chaos and necessary destruction. It clears away the old to make room for the new.

nauthiz.description: Nauthiz speaks of difficulties and inner needs. It teaches patience, self-control, and resilience.

isa.description: Isa is a symbol of a frozen state. It is a time for stillness, reflection, and introspection.

jera.description: Jera is the rune of harvest. It reminds us that everything has its time, and effort always bears fruit.

eihwaz.description: Eihwaz is a symbol of transformation and inner strength. It guides through difficulties to profound changes.

perthro.description: Perthro is the rune of fate and the hidden. It points to the unexpected, intuition, and esoteric knowledge.

algiz.description: Algiz is a protective rune. It awakens instincts, intuition, and spiritual support.

sowilo.description: Sowilo is the sun, triumph, and inner light. It indicates enlightenment, energy, and clarity.

tiwaz.description: Tiwaz is the warrior and truth rune. It embodies honor, courage, and sacrifice for a higher purpose.

berkano.description: Berkano is the rune of the feminine principle, fertility, and rebirth. It symbolizes new beginnings and growth.

ehwaz.description: Ehwaz symbolizes trust and moving forward. It is a rune of partnership, harmonious development, and progress.

mannaz.description: Mannaz is the rune of humanity, individuality, and social unity. It helps to better understand oneself and others.

laguz.description: Laguz is the flow of life, water, the subconscious. It leads to deep emotions, intuition, and dreams.

ingwaz.description: Ingwaz is a rune of tranquility, inner strength, and completeness. It signifies maturation and wholeness.

dagaz.description: Dagaz is the rune of a new day, insight, and great transition. It brings clarity and renewal.

othala.description: Othala is the rune of lineage, heritage, and spiritual home. It is associated with deep values and roots.

atmosphericUpdates.text1: The Ansuz rune flashed by — a day of inspiration
atmosphericUpdates.text2: The gates of Midgard have slightly opened...
atmosphericUpdates.text3: The spirits of code are resting today. Maybe you should too
atmosphericUpdates.text4: The flame of Kenaz illuminated a new idea in the darkness
atmosphericUpdates.text5: The mechanisms of Yggdrasil turned one more cycle
atmosphericUpdates.text6: Thor is thundering — time for decisive changes
atmosphericUpdates.text7: The icy silence of Niflheim — calm before the breakthrough
atmosphericUpdates.text8: The Wyrd web is woven — not everything is random
atmosphericUpdates.text9: The shadow of Helheim brought reflection
atmosphericUpdates.text10: Odin whispered a thought… not fully understood yet
atmosphericUpdates.text11: Ideas flash like lightning in Alfheim
atmosphericUpdates.text12: Protection activated: the Algiz rune guards your peace
atmosphericUpdates.text13: The boundary between worlds is thin… time to look inside yourself
atmosphericUpdates.text14: Bifröst lit up with new colors — energy is near
atmosphericUpdates.text15: The Perthro rune opens new possibilities — choose wisely
atmosphericUpdates.text16: Signal from Valhalla received. Time to act
atmosphericUpdates.text17: Look into Urd’s reflection — the past speaks
atmosphericUpdates.text18: Light from Asgard guides the way forward
atmosphericUpdates.text19: Sleep mode activated. Restarting in progress
atmosphericUpdates.text20: Old runes whisper stories from forgotten scripts
atmosphericUpdates.text21: Cycle of rebirth activated. Start anew — stronger
atmosphericUpdates.text22: Loki’s mask has fallen — truth is closer than it seems
atmosphericUpdates.text23: The Isa rune freezes time — seize the moment
atmosphericUpdates.text24: DNA code synchronized with the rhythm of the cosmos
atmosphericUpdates.text25: The Moon’s shadow closes old thoughts — reboot
atmosphericUpdates.text26: Portal to Muspelheim opened. Caution: fire of change

chroniclesPage.headerIntro: In every project, a spark. In every interface, a trace of mind. Here lie the chronicles of a digital forge.

about.subtitle: Code. Myth. Ideology.
about.mission: Skyntr — [“Skin” + “Inter”]<1/>The one who shapes the layer of interaction between human and machine, between structure and feeling.<1/>It's not just 'frontend' — it's a project merging technology and mythology.
about.philosophy: <1/>Our approach is like ancient runes: simplicity, strength, and multiplicity of meaning.<1/>We create not buttons, but interactions.<1/>Not pages — but meaning.<1/>Not trends — but a structure that withstands time.
about.technology: Using modern frameworks, animation, neural networks, and design, I aim to create new forms of digital aesthetics.

description.description1: Denis's personal portfolio website, designed to showcase foundational web development skills. Ideal for a beginner's portfolio.
description.description2: A business card website for Konstruct, serving as an example of basic web development capabilities. Ideal for a beginner's portfolio.
description.description3: A corporate website developed for the Polish company Fair Partner. This collaborative project with Meat Hammer Studio ensures an effective online presence.
description.description4: A website for People Tobacco, a hookah tobacco manufacturer, showcasing their products and brand. Focused on an attractive display of their assortment.
description.description5: The official corporate website for Meat Hammer Studio, where I worked since 2020. This project demonstrates the studio's capabilities and my team contribution.
description.description6: An elegant business card website for the Manipura yoga center. Designed to create a serene and inviting online presence that reflects the philosophy of yoga.
description.description7: A website created for Europe's largest go-kart track, Batumi Racing Club in Georgia. Developed to provide information about the club's services and events.
description.description8: A website commissioned by the international web development company Sketch2Site Development. The project highlights capabilities for rapid and high-quality implementation.
description.description9: A project completed for the Spanish web development company Sers. Finished in just 50 hours, demonstrating efficiency and speed in task execution.
description.description10: A business card website for the Biko Butik online store. Created for convenient product presentation and attracting customers in the e-commerce sector.
description.description11: Andriy Zhukov's personal portfolio website, showcasing his professional skills and web development projects. Optimized for SEO and user convenience.
description.description12: An interactive online calculator to determine the required amount of meat for a barbecue party. A simple and useful tool for event planning.

portfolioCard.subTitle: Website
portfolioCard.urlNotAviable: The website is currently not publicly available
